verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Now the Philistines נִלְחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> fought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיָּ֑נָס <S%H5127><s%> fled אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fell down חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> slain בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> Gilboa

וַיַּדְבְּק֣וּ <S%H1692><s%> followed hard פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> and after בָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons וַיַּכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> slew פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָתָ֧ן <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִינָדָ֛ב <S%H41><s%> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> and Malchishua בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וַתִּכְבַּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> went sore הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> And the battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> against Saul וַיִּמְצָאֻ֖הוּ <S%H4672><s%> hit הַמּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H3384><s%> of the archers בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> arch וַיָּ֖חֶל <S%H2342><s%> him and he was wounded מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> by הַיּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H3384><s%> the archers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נֹשֵׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֜יו <S%H3627><s%> to his armor שְׁלֹ֥ף <S%H8025><s%> Draw חַרְבְּךָ֣ ׀ <S%H2719><s%> thy sword וְדָקְרֵ֣נִי <S%H1856><s%> and thrust בָ֗הּ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יָבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> come הָעֲרֵלִ֤ים <S%H6189><s%> me through therewith lest these uncircumcised הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ־ <S%H5953><s%> and abuse בִ֔י וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָה֙ <S%H14><s%> would נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> not for he was sore ס וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> So Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and fell עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw נֹשֵֽׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> he fell גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> likewise ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> likewise on the sword וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and died ס

וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> So Saul וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and his three בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> sons וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and all his house יַחְדָּ֥ו <S%H3162><s%> together מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> died

וַ֠יִּרְאוּ <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּעֵ֙מֶק֙ <S%H6010><s%> that [were] in the valley כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֔סוּ <S%H5127><s%> that they fled וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> were dead שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> and that Saul וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> then they forsook עָרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5892><s%> their cities וַיָּנֻ֔סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and fled וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בָּהֶֽם׃ ס

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> when the Philistines לְפַשֵּׁ֖ט <S%H6584><s%> to strip אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֲלָלִ֑ים <S%H2491><s%> the slain וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> that they found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons נֹפְלִ֖ים <S%H5307><s%> fallen בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> Gilboa

וַיַּ֨פְשִׁיטֻ֔הוּ <S%H6584><s%> And when they had stripped וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> him they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> and his armour וַיְשַׁלְּח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> into the land פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְבַשֵּׂ֛ר <S%H1319><s%> to carry tidings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H6091><s%> unto their idols וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and to the people

וַיָּשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> And they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armour בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> of their gods וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֻּלְגָּלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H1538><s%> his head תָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> and fastened בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the temple דָּגֽוֹן׃ <S%H1712><s%> of Dagon ס

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> had done פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> all that the Philistines לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> to Saul

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <S%H6965><s%> They arose כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men חַיִל֒ <S%H2428><s%> all the valiant וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> and took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גּוּפַ֣ת <S%H1480><s%> the body שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> גּוּפֹ֣ת <S%H1480><s%> and the bodies בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons וַיְבִיא֖וּם <S%H935><s%> and brought יָבֵ֑ישָׁה <S%H3003><s%> them to Jabesh וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <S%H6912><s%> and buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמוֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6106><s%> their bones תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֵלָה֙ <S%H424><s%> under the oak בְּיָבֵ֔שׁ <S%H3003><s%> in Jabesh וַיָּצ֖וּמוּ <S%H6684><s%> and fasted שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> So Saul בְּמַֽעֲלוֹ֙ <S%H4603><s%> which he committed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which מָעַ֣ל <S%H4604><s%> for his transgression בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> [even] against the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמָ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> which he kept וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also לִשְׁא֥וֹל <S%H7592><s%> not and also for asking בָּא֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> [counsel] of [one that had] a familiar spirit לִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not דָרַ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> And enquired בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> not of the LORD וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> therefore he slew וַיַּסֵּב֙ <S%H5437><s%> him and turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> the kingdom לְדָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse פ
